--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Hi Hagop, 

 

We would like to arrange a meeting with you and the team to discuss the solutions we can support you with. 

 

FARNEK provides a comprehensive range of Total Facilities Management solutions. 

*	Comprehensive Housekeeping services. 
*	Security Guards and Pool Lifeguards. 
*	Manpower supply solutions. 
*	Workforce solutions Professional staff outsourcing. 
*	Electromechanical Predictive, Corrective Maintenance services. 
*	Civil and Fabric Work.
*	Energy Management Solutions. 
*	Technology Solutions.

 

We would welcome the opportunity to discuss how Farnek's TFM services can add value to your business and enhance the visitor experience at your facilities.  

 

Please feel free to reach out to me to schedule a meeting or discuss your specific requirements in more detail.

We would welcome the opportunity to discuss how Farnek's TFM services can add value to your business and enhance the visitor experience at your facilities.  

 

Please feel free to reach out to me to schedule a meeting or discuss your specific requirements in more detail.

 

We look forward to the possibility of working together to achieve your goals. 

 

Best Regards,

 

Mohamad Akkad

Sr. Business Development Manager

 



 

P.O. Box: 5423, Dubai, UAE

T: +971 4 382 4400 | M: +971 56 401 7510
